subtasks: Assess current El Niño or La Niña phase.
Adjust planting timing based on moisture and temperature forecasts.
Anticipate climate change impacts on crops (e.g., peanuts) and prepare.
Enhance irrigation infrastructure or select drought-resistant varieties.
Implement water scheduling during hot and dry periods.
Manage pests through crop rotation and proper planting times.
Mitigate aflatoxin risk in warmer, drier conditions.
Attend to soil pests when growing peanuts without irrigation.
